title: New mobility scooter training sessions announced 12 Oct 2015 (Nottinghamshire County Council)
text: ( Source : Nottinghamshire County Council ) 12 Oct 2015 - 09:06 Nottinghamshire residents are being encouraged to sign up to a new round of forthcoming mobility scooter training sessions supported by the County Council to reduce the risk of
